infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: FlynnAI uses the camera to capture screenshots of job details, quotes, and work orders. This helps automatically extract information and create calendar events for your business.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: FlynnAI accesses your photo library to select images containing job details that can be automatically processed into calendar events and client information.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: FlynnAI uses the microphone to record and transcribe phone calls with clients to automatically capture job details and create bookings.
